Slack Instant Messaging¶

class importers.instant_messaging.slack.slack2db_extract_main.Slack2DbMain(db_name, project_name, type, instant_messaging_name, before_date, channels, tokens, config, log_root_path)[source]¶

This class handles the import of Slack data

extract()[source]¶

insert_attachment(own_id, message_id, name, extension, bytes, url)[source]¶

insert attachment of a message

Parameters:
  • own_id (int) – data source message id
  • message_id (int) – DB message id
  • name (str) – attachment name
  • extension (str) – attachment extension
  • bytes (int) – attachment size in bytes
  • url (str) – attachment url

inserts channel to DB

Parameters:
  • own_id (int) – data source channel id
  • instant_messaging_id (int) – instant messaging id
  • name (str) – title of the channel
  • description (str) – channel description
  • created_at (str) – creation date
  • last_change_at (str) – last change date

inserts instant messaging to DB

Parameters:
  • project_id (int) – project id
  • instant_messaging_name (str) – instant messaging name
  • type (str) – instant messaging type (Slack, IRC)
insert_message(own_id, pos, type, channel_id, body, author_id, created_at)[source]¶

inserts message to DB

Parameters:
  • own_id (int) – data source message id
  • pos (int) – position of the message in the topic
  • type (str) – type of the message (question, reply)
  • channel_id (int) – DB channel id
  • body (str) – message body
  • author_id (int) – id of the author
  • created_at (str) – creation time of the message
